metadata.Title: CVE-2023-41164 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Django 3.2 before 3.2.21, 4.1 before 4.1.11, and 4.2 before 4.2.5, django.utils.encoding.uri_to_iri() is subject to a potential DoS (denial of service) attack via certain inputs with a very large number of Unicode characters.

notes.Note: alexmurray> According to the upstream advisory affects versions 3.2.x, 4.1.x and 4.2.x with fixes in 3.2.21, 4.1.11 and 4.2.5 respectively

criterions.comment: python-django package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
